author: RomanP
post_text: June 14, 2013 at 8:20 AM#1The defaultmixcolorreadout must be CMY !!!!Select any Fixture and start the macrotype the lee-number in the box ... thats allits a faster way to set the color.type for Lee 068 only 68 ( without the first zero )All values for the color are from GM2 V 3.0.0.2 SwatchBook   <<<<< UPDATEThe defaultmixcolorreadout must be CMY !!!!if anybody need the others colors ( rosco ... ) i can also create a macro for thisThe macros are now exported with GM2 V3.1.1.1Sorry for my bad englishFilessel. at LEE Filter.xml53.98 kB – 150 Downloadssel. at ROSCO Filter.xml49.77 kB – 180 Downloads
title: Macro: selection at LEE-Filter
